CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Brookfield BRP Holdings (Canada) Inc., is a renewable energy company. The Company invests in renewable assets directly, as well as with institutional partners, joint venture partners and in other arrangements. The Company's portfolio consists of hydroelectric, wind, solar and storage facilities in North America, South America, Europe and Asia, and totals approximately 20,000 megawatts (MW) of installed capacity and an approximately 23,000 MW development pipeline.
